mapping.sql: select g.id GLBDATASET_ID, nvl(g.NAME,'--') GLBDATASET_NAME, nvl(g.TYPE,'--') GLBDATASET_TYPE, nvl(g.SQL,'--') GLBDATASET_SQL, nvl(g.CREATE_USER,'--') CREATE_USER, nvl(e.USER_NAME,'--') CREATE_USER_NAME, nvl(g.CREATE_TIME,'--') CREATE_TIME, nvl(g.MODIFY_USER,'--') MODIFY_USER, nvl(k.USER_NAME,'--') MODIFY_USER_NAME, nvl(g.MODIFY_TIME,'--') MODIFY_TIME, nvl(s.db_name,'--') DB_NAME from (X_DATASET_GLOBAL g left join X_EXT_DB_SOURCE s on (g.TYPE = s.DB_SOURCE) left join e_user e on (g.CREATE_USER = e.user_id) join (select f.id, f.modify_user, h.user_name from X_DATASET_GLOBAL f left join e_user h on (f.modify_user = h.user_id)) k on (k.id = g.id)) where 1=1 and #USER_ID# in (select user_id from E_USER_ACCOUNT where account_code in (select account_code from E_USER_ACCOUNT where user_id=g.CREATE_USER) ) { and g.name like '%'||#glbdataset_name#||'%' } { and g.create_time >= #create_time_start#||'000000' } { and g.create_time <= #create_time_end#||'235959' } { and g.modify_time >= #modify_time_start#||'000000' } { and g.modify_time <= #modify_time_end#||'235959' } order by g.CREATE_TIME desc
